journey.title: My Journey & Mission
content: I come from a humble background. Life hasn't been easy — but I never gave up. I've faced challenges, learned from failures, and kept moving forward with a dream to become a top-level developer. Coding is not just my job — it's my passion and purpose.
My mission is to grow every day — to learn new technologies, improve my problem-solving skills, and become a complete full-stack developer who builds intelligent, efficient, and beautiful systems.
"If you love your work and stay honest with your effort, success will find you."
With hard work and Allah's blessing, I believe one day I'll build something truly remarkable.

points.title: Passionate & Responsible
points.description: Deadline-focused and deeply committed to every project

points.title: Full-Stack Expertise
points.description: Deep understanding of both frontend and backend development

points.title: Technology Versatility
points.description: Experienced in Django, WordPress, and modern JS frameworks

points.title: Continuous Learner
points.description: Always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies

points.title: Personal Investment
points.description: Treats every project as if it's my own
